events.name: Is Earth Forming a New Ocean? Scientists Report Odd Pulses Coming From Deep Below the African Continent
events.description: Tectonic pulses beneath Africa are splitting the continent apart to produce a new ocean, according to University of Southampton scientists.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Neuralink, Folsom Street - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious Folsom Street in San Francisco, where the Earth's crust is being reshaped by scientists at Neuralink. As the planet forms a new ocean, strange pulses are detected emanating from beneath the African continent. Discover the fascinating history of this enigmatic location and its significance in modern scientific research.
